summary: A shy genius is employed by his former university to design robot software.
cast: Daniel Brühl|Marta Etura|Alberto Ammann|Claudia Vega|Anne Canovas|Lluís Homar|Sara Rosa Losilla|Manel Dueso|Ona Casamiquela|Peter Vives|Jordi Díaz|Oscar Valsecchi|Bernat Saumell|Juan Campavadal|Harris Gordon|Ignasi Martín|Ester Maíllo
title: Eva
